Weaver/pkg/shell/shell.go.description: Line 212 contains the static 'thinking...' text that needs to be replaced with animated spinner. Also lines 342, 389, 457, 508, 519 show other long-running operations that need spinners.

Weaver/pkg.description: Package structure follows pattern of separate directories per feature (analysis, backend, concepts, config, runtime, shell). New spinner package should be at Weaver/pkg/spinner/.

Weaver/pkg/spinner/spinner.go.description: Elapsed time display is controlled by Config.ShowElapsed (defaults to true). formatElapsed() formats durations as "(1.2s)" for < 1 minute or "(1m 30s)" for longer durations. Integrated into render() which builds output as "char message (elapsed)".
